phrases.phrase: 전 노래방에 일주일에 적어도 세 번은 가요.
meanings: 노래방 I go to a Noraebang at least three times a week.

phrases.phrase: 적어도 15년 동안 만나지 않은 것 같네요.
meanings: 대화 시작 I haven't seen you in at least 15 years.
대화 시작 I haven't met you for at least 15 years.

phrases.phrase: 다른 일에 문제가 생겨서 적어도 한 달 간은 어떠한 일도 맡을 수가 없대요.
meanings: 직장에서의 표현 They're running into problems on another job and won't be able to take on anything else for at least a month.

meanings.meaning: if he's, she's, etc. a day

vlive.korean: 적어도 내가 보기에는? but from the way I see it, yes. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 네 옆에는 늘 내가 있을래 [연애미수] EP10
vlive.english: but from the way I see it, yes.

vlive.korean: 근데 적어도 14등 한 거면 뭐... At least, 14th place is... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 게임의 정석
적어도 진짜 최소 2년? I think it will take at least two years? 듣기 View video IU : [Replay] [IU] Comeback VLIVE
vlive.english: I think it will take at least two years?

vlive.korean: 못 그린 사람에 대한 벌칙은 없는 거죠 적어도? Is there a penalty for the worst painter? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.1
vlive.english: Is there a penalty for the worst painter?

vlive.korean: 적어도 제가 봤을 때는 9시에 끝나지 않을까? At the earliest, wouldn't it end around 9 o'clock? 듣기 View video VICTON : Day-1!!💕💕
vlive.english: At the earliest, wouldn't it end around 9 o'clock?

examples.korean: Most households now own at least one car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이제는 대부분의 가정이 차를 적어도 한 대는 소유하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Most households now own at least one car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At least they died happy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 적어도 그들은 행복한 죽음을 맞았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At least they died happy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She must be at least 40. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 (나이가) 적어도 마흔은 되었을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She must be at least 40. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He said he’ll be coming tomorrow. At any rate, I think that’s what he said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 내일 온다고 했어. 적어도, 내 생각에는 그가 그렇게 말했던 것 같애. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He said he’ll be coming tomorrow. At any rate, I think that’s what he said. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He must be 70 if he’s a day! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 분이 연세가 적어도 70은 됐을 걸! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He must be 70 if he’s a day! Add to Wordbook
